[1]:

%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2

[3]:

import molsysmt as msm

Getting a brief description of a molecular system¶

[4]:

molecular_system = msm.load('1tcd.mmtf')

[5]:

msm.info(molecular_system)

[5]:
form atoms groups components chains molecules entities waters proteins frames
molsysmt.MolSys 3983 662 167 4 166 2 165 1 1 
[6]:

msm.info(molecular_system, indices=[9,10,11,12,13,14,15], target='atom')

[6]:
index id name type group index group id group name group type component_index chain index chain id chain name molecule index molecule type entity index entity name

10 11 CA C 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE
11 12 C C 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE
12 13 O O 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE
13 14 CB C 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE
14 15 CG C 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE
15 16 CD C 1 5 PRO aminoacid 0 0 A A 0 protein 0 TRIOSEPHOSPHATE ISOMERASE

msm.info(molecular_system, selection='group.index==4', target='atom')
